title: 17 -- HTMLrats--Michael Pascuzzi
body:
* [x] **Yak Shaving**
  * _WIP Issue_: `17 -- HTMLrats`
  *  _WIP Branch_:
    * `USERNAME.github.io:journal-week-4`
    * `TIY-Github:master`
    * `TIY-Github:yak-shaving`
  * _WIP Files_:
    * `USERNAME.github.io`
      * reflective journal
      * tutorial journal
    * `TIY-Github`: see below
* [x] **Journal, Week 3**
   * [x] Reflective Post - rough draft
   * [x] Peer Review x 2!
   * [x] Tutorial Post - rough draft
   * [x] Peer Review x2!
* [ ] **Reading APIs**
   * [x] Authentication
     * [x] Authenticate
     * [x] Unauthenticated
     * [x] 3 ways to authenticate a request
   * [ ] Ask the API for stuff
     * [ ] Profile info -- specific user
     * [ ] Repo info -- specific user
     * [ ] Recent public activity -- specific user
   * [x] Making requests
     * [x] The limit
     * [x] Extending the limit
     * [x] Hitting the limit
   * [ ] Data returned
     * [ ] A lot of data?
     * [ ] Asking for more or less...
     * [ ] Is there more data available? How do I know?
* [ ] **More API**
  * [ ] Promise interface
  * [ ] XmlHttpRequest
  * [ ] window.fetch
  * [ ] q docs
* [x] **Github Revolution**
  * [x] new repo: TIY-Github
  * [x] This tree has a branch: yak shaving
      * api/
        * github/
          * users/
      * dist/
      * specs/
      * src/
          * scss/
          * tests/
  * [x] bower.json & package.json
  * [x] H5BP and mocha in src/
  * [x] Ignore everything in dist/ except .gitignore
* [x] **Skitch**
  * [x] Screen shot and mark up profile page
  * [x] Save to specs/profile.png
  * [ ] Additional pieces saved as specs/profile-PROFILEPIECENAME.png
* [ ] **API Gymnastics**
  * [ ] octocat profile data
  * [ ] octocat repo data
  * **BEAST MODE**
     * [ ] Fetch YOUR profile data
     * [ ] Fetch your repo data
* [ ] Scripts added
  * [ ] start and test in package.json
* [x] Install stuff
  * [x] npm install --global:
     * [x] wiredep
     * [x] node-sass
  * [x] bower install:
     * [x] pure
     * [x] jquery
     * [x] lodash

* [x] **Journal - Week 4**
  * [x] Reflective - Outline/Rough Draft
   * [ ] Peer Review x 2!
  * [ ] Tutorial - Outline/Rough Draft
   * [ ] Peer Review x2!
* [x] **TIY-Github**
  * [x] Create new repo: TIY-Github
  * [x] Branch: yak shaving
  * [x] `api/`
  * [x] `github/`
  * [x] `users/`

title: 17 -- HTMLrats -- Melissa Rodriguez
body:
* [x] **Yak Shaving**
  * _WIP Issue_: `17 -- HTMLrats -- Melissa Rodriguez`
  *  _WIP Branch_:
    * `USERNAME.github.io:journal-week-4`
    * `TIY-Github:master`
    * `TIY-Github:yak-shaving`
  * _WIP Files_:
    *  [x] `USERNAME.github.io`
      * [ ] reflective journal
      * [ ] tutorial journal
    * [x] `TIY-Github`:
- [x] ### YAK Shaving:
- [x] Just get it done. 

- [x] ### Chode School:
  - [x] Java Script Roadtrip 1
  - [x] Java Script Roadtrip 2
  - [ ] Java Script Roadtrip 3

- [x] ### Chessboard:
  - [ ] Get that jQuery working!
  - [x] Look at the Two-dimensional array (maybe try to work that out)

- [ ] ### Journal, Week 4:
  - [ ] Reflective (Css , HTML)
  - [ ] Tutorial (Atom shortcuts?, :nthchild pseudo element?...)

- [x] **Reading APIs**
- [x] **Github Revolution**
This week, we're building your Github profile with data from the Github API. You'll need to create a new repository called TIY-Github* and populate it with the usual **README.md** and **LICENSE** file. Then create a branch called `yak-shaving` that adds the following tree:

- [x] api/
 - [x] github/
  - [x] users/
   - [x] dist/
     - [x] .gitignore 
- [x] specs/
- [x] src/
- [x] scss/
- [x] tests/

- [x] Use your init commands to create `bower.json` and `package.json` files at the top of the repository (i.e. NOT insrc/), and use `Yeoman` to initialize `H5BP` and `Mocha` into `src/`. Create a `.gitignore` in `dist/` that **excludes everything except itself**.

- [x] **Skitch this Profile**
 - [x] Grab a screenshot of your profile page using Skitch and save it to specs/profile.png. 
 - [x] Break down the layout into pieces and export them with the profile- prefix into specs/. 
 - [x] For example, `specs/profile-repositories.png` might be the Repositories section of your profile. 
 - [ ] Make lots of these.

- [x] **API Gymnastics:**
 - [x] Fetch the profile data for user octocat and store it in api/github/users/octocat.json, then fetch the repository data and save it to api/github/users/octocat/repos.json. What other data can you identify in your profile? Can you fetch that data, too?

- [x] **Follow the Script!**
 - [x] Add script definitions to your package.json for start and test that run browser-sync appropriately: watch the right files, start in the right place, etc.

- [x] **npm install --global:**
 - [x] `wiredep`
 - [x] `node-sass`
- [x] **bower install:**
 - [x] `pure`
 - [x] `jquery`
 - [x] `lodash`

title: 17--HTMLrats--Nick Pope
body:
* [ ] **Yak Shaving**
  * _WIP Issue_: `17 -- HTMLrats`
  *  _WIP Branch_:
    * `USERNAME.github.io:journal-week-4`
    * `TIY-Github:master`
    * `TIY-Github:yak-shaving`
  * _WIP Files_:
    * `USERNAME.github.io`
      * reflective journal
      * tutorial journal
    * `TIY-Github`: 
      *  Create REPO
         * [x] `api/`
            * [x] `github/`
              * [x] `users/`
          * [x] `dist/`
          * [x] `specs`
          * [x] `src/`
            * [x] `scss/`
            * [x] `tests/`
       * `init`  files:
         * [x] bower.json
         * [x] package.json
       * Yeoman packages:
         * `src/`
            * [x] YO H5BP
            * [x] YO MOCHA
         * `dist/`
            * [x] `.gitignore`
      * SKITCH Personal Profile:
         * [ ] Create Breakdown of profile
           * [ ] save as `profile-.png`
             * [ ] save to `specs/`
         * [ ] Have a party, invite a ton of skitch breakdowns (at least 4)
       * Work out w/ `API`
         * [ ] fetch `octocat` store it in `api/github/users/octocat.json`
           * [ ] fetch the REPO and store it in `api/github/users/octocat/repos.json`
        * BEAST MODE - see `17--HTMLrats` branch.
    * INSTALLATION:
      * `npm install --global`
         * [x] `wiredep`
         * [x] `node-sass`
       * `bower install`
         * [x] `pure`
         * [x] `jQuery`
         * [x] `lodash`

title: 17 -- HTMLrats -- Jessy Riordan
body:
* [x] **Yak Shaving**
  * _WIP Issue_: `17 -- HTMLrats`
  *  _WIP Branch_:
    * `USERNAME.github.io:journal-week-4`
    * `TIY-Github:master`
    * `TIY-Github:yak-shaving`
  * _WIP Files_:
    * `USERNAME.github.io`
      * reflective journal
      * tutorial journal
    * `TIY-Github`: 
      * `api/`
        * `github/`
          * `users/`
      * `dist/`
      * `specs/`
      * `src/`
        * `scss/`
        * `tests/`
* [x] **Journal**
  * [x] Reflective - Rough Draft/Outline
  * [x] Tutorial - Rough Draft/Outline
* [ ] **Reading APIs**
  * [ ] How does the API handle authentication?
    * [ ] Do I need to authenticate?
    * [ ] What can I do with an unauthenticated request?
    * [ ] How can I authenticate my request? (3 ways)
  * [ ] How do I ask the API for...
    * [ ] The profile information for a specific user?
    * [ ] The repository listing for a specific user?
    * [ ] The recent, public activity for a specific user?
  * [ ] Is there a limit to the number of requests I can make?
    * [ ] Is there a way of extending that limit?
    * [ ] What happens when I hit the limit?
  * [ ] What if there is a lot of data returned?
    * [ ] How can I ask for more (or less) data from a request?
    * [ ] How do I know that there is more data available?
* [x] **Github Revolution**
  * [x] create repo called `TIY-Github`
  * [x] create branch called `yak-shaving`
  * [x] Use `init` command to create `bower.json` 
  * [x] Use `init` command to create `package.json` 
  * [x] use Yeoman to initialize H5BP and Mocha into `src/` 
  * [x] Create a `.gitignore` in `dist/` that excludes everything except itself.
* [ ] **Skitch this Profile**
  * [ ] screenshot your profile page using Skitch and save it to `specs/profile.png`
  * [ ] Break down the layout into pieces and export them with the `profile-` prefix into `specs/` 
    * [ ] Make lots of these.
* [ ] **API Gymnastics**
  * [x] Fetch the profile data for user octocat and store it in `api/github/users/octocat.json`
  * [x] fetch the repository data and save it to `api/github/users/octocat/repos.json`
  * [ ] Anymore data?
  * [ ] **BEAST MODE**: fetch all that data for yourself, save it in `api/github/users/USERNAME.json` and `api/github/users/USERNAME/`
* [x] **Follow the Script!**
  * [x] Add script definitions to your `package.json`:
    * [x]  for `start` that runs `browser-sync` appropriately
    * [x] for `test` that runs `browser-sync` appropriately
* [x] **Install EVERYTHING...**
  * [x] npm install --global:
    * [x] wiredep
    * [x] node-sass
  * [x] bower install
    * [x] pure
    * [x] jquery
    * [x] lodash

    * [x] `bower.json` & `package.json` -- TO THE TOP!!! WOAH OHHHHH! _Twin Shadow_ reference
